Delivery is required to be arranged by kind donor, please click to donate so that we can get in touch with you soon. We thank you for your kindness in advance!

name: Macbook
description: DeafBlind client uses JAWS programme, a screen reader, to use his computer effectively. However, JAWS is expensive to renew every time there is an update, and he is unable to afford the renewal. An alternative is to get a Macbook on which the JAWS software does not need to be renewed, to alleviate his financial burden in taking care of his wife and 2 children

name: Motorized wheelchair
description:
Client (56 y/o) has been paralyzed from the waist down since his adolescence and is reliant on a motorized wheelchair to get around the house and outdoors as well.

He is currently looking for sources of employment but his existing motorized wheelchair is due for replacement as the battery is dying after usage for multiple years. Having access to a new motorized wheelchair will empower him to be able to strive towards greater independence as he tries to look for new and sustainable sources of employment. 

Link to a motorized wheelchair that would fit his needs can be found here: https://shop.lifelinecorp.com/collections/motorised-wheelchairs/products/copy-of-space-foldable-powerchair-20ah

name: Motorised Scooter
description: Ct, aged 73, has mobility issues.  Her current motorised scooter has spoilt. She cannot afford the replacement cost. Her children have financial commitments and are unable to help her. Her husband is working but his income is also insufficient.

name: Wheeled Commode Chair
description: A client aged 80, diagnosed with lymphoma cancer, requires a wheeled commode chair. The cancer has metastasized to her ribs and bones, causing her difficulty in walking. She needs a commode chair to make it easier for her to use the toilet daily.

name: Wheelchair
description: Client is a cancer patient diagnosed with colorectal cancer (stage 4). His cancer has spread after almost 2 years of treatment and has worsened. He is unfit to work, and his wife is looking after him. Client requires a wheelchair to aid mobility and allow him to travel for his cancer treatments with ease.
specifications: Standard size for adult, preferably with higher back height

name: Motorised wheelchair
description:
An elderly client is caring for an adult child with multiple medical conditions who needs to be assisted with a wheelchair. 
Elderly also suffers from a medical condition that doesn’t allow her to walk for too long. As such, it has been difficult pushing her adult daughter in the wheelchair. 
As such, a motorized wheelchair with the ability to take a weight of 160kg will provide the elderly relief from the strain of pushing her adult child and it will help increase the mobility of the family. Especially when going for multiple medical appointments.
